name: The SCWG Tee
description:
Exclusive to the Scallywag Launch Series. 

Part of the launch series of tees designed exclusively for the brand and printed as a limited edition product. Designed by our very own artist. Garment is a a 1 colour design lovingly screenprinted in a series of 100 in the UK on a fresh white tee. 

The model in this picture is wearing a size Medium. 

Shirt measurements are as follows : 

Size Width (Centimetres) Length (Centimetres) 
Small 46 71 
Medium 51 74 
Large 56 76 

For washing instructions please refer to our FAQ.

If you have any questions regarding the products shoot us an e-mail at sup@scallywagapparel.co.uk and we'll get back to as soon as!

We thank you for your support in a start-up independent brand!

Cheers!

name: The Crest Print
description:
Exclusive to the Scallywag Launch Series.

Part of the launch series of Prints designed exclusively for the brand and printed as a limited edition product. Designed by our very own artist. Print is on high quality Glossy paper and will be delivered wrapped and secure in postal tube, signed and numbered.

Print size is (inches) : 11.7" x 16.5"

If you have any questions regarding the products shoot us an e-mail at sup@scallywagapparel.co.uk and we'll get back to as soon as!

We thank you for your support in a start-up independent brand!

Cheers!
